description: This is a request for proposal to develop the web content for Canada.ca website. Professional services required are: level 3 systems analyst, level 2 systems analyst, level 3 platform analyst, level 2 platform analyst, level 3 project manager. The contractor needs to have a designated organization screening (DOS) and enhanced reliability. Minimum corporate security required

Demande de proposition découtant d'un arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement
full_summary:
# Managed Web Services Professional Support

## Tender Announcement

### Reference Number
cb-4899-37677370

### Amendment Number
1

### Solicitation Number
100022413

### Publication Date
21 April 2023

### Closing Date
8 May 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

### Amendment Date
8 May 2023

### Expected Contract Start Date
3 June 2023

### Expected Contract End Date
31 March 2024

### Notice Type
RFP against Supply Arrangement

## Business Requirements

We are seeking a professional services agreement to provide a team of IT professionals to support the Managed Web Services (MWS) web content development for the Canada.ca website.

### Work Description

We require a team of experts to provide professional support and services to enhance and maintain the Canada.ca website.

### Security Requirements

* Common PS SRCL #02 applies
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Enhanced Reliability

### Evaluation Criteria

* Technical Merit (40% of total score)
* Price (30% of total score)
* Past Performance (30% of total score)

### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

The NPP is available on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.

### Evaluation of Proposals

Proposals will be evaluated based on the evaluation criteria outlined above.

### Contract Administration

The successful bidder will be required to sign a contract with the Government of Canada.

### Terms and Conditions

The terms and conditions of the contract will be outlined in the RFP documents.

### Elements of the Request for Proposal

The elements of the RFP are as follows:

* One (1) Level 3 Systems Analyst
* One (1) Level 2 Systems Analyst
* One (1) Level 3 Platform Analyst
* One (1) Level 2 Platform Analyst
* One (1) Level 3 Project Manager

### Statement of Work

The successful bidder will be required to provide a team of experts to perform the following tasks:

* Provide professional support and services to enhance and maintain the Canada.ca website
* Develop and implement a plan to improve the website's functionality and user experience
* Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure the website meets the business requirements
* Perform testing and quality assurance activities to ensure the website meets the required standards

### Supporting Documents

The RFP documents, including the NPP and contract terms and conditions, can be found
